TopicTitle: Can't find the docking port cover mod(with possible heat shield?)

Articles.Content:
A few months back I thought I saw a docking port cover mod (which might acted as a heat shield?).

Now I've used search on this forum, spaceport and tried Google, but I just can't find it.

So does anyone have an idea on what it's called or if it was even released?
Er, there's a covered docking port in stock. Are you sure it was a mod? It can get confusing if you have lots of mods installed and can't remember what belongs in what mod and what's stock.
It was a black cover which folded out like the stock one, but at the size of a senior docking port.
